name: SUCCUBI
description: SUCCUBI is a (TC) porn wad. It contains over 100 'dirty pictures' : merely as decoration and 6 animations for spice. The real treat : however is that there are a good number of brand new sprites! : This is the only Doom Wad I know of that actually has naked lady : monsters! These sprites are made of hundreds of individually : drawn frames of animation (of near professional quality). Of : course numerous new sounds were incorporated so as to fit the : sprites. : : SUCCUBI is a work in progress. I hope to release expanded and : improved versions incorporating more sprites and more levels. : Anyone wishing to assist by creating levels is encouraged to : contact me. pan@cam.org
